title: error when reaching a website
content:
Just downloaded an update and this error message appears:

You don't have permission to access "http://www.kroger.com/" on this server.

Reference #18.a9423917.1770250884.86f3e1c1

https://errors.edgesuite.net/18.a9423917.1770250884.86f3e1c1 

I have tried 9 times to reach kroger.com and get this every time.

title: Is there a way to get a certain section of Recommended Stories on the home page?
content:

title: EVERYTHING IS GONE!!!
content: I HAVE BEEN WITHOUT WI-FI FOR ALMOST 3 YEARS NOW, AND ALL OF A SUDDEN TODAY WHEN I HAD SOMETHING ELSE TO TAKE CARE OF ELSEWHERE ON MY PHONE EVERYTHING FROM MY FIREFOX ACCOUNT WAS WIPED OUT AND I MEAN EVERYTHING ALL MY PASSWORDS EVERYTHING IS GONE I DON'T KNOW HOW TO GET ANYTHING BACK I DON'T EVEN KNOW HOW TO REINSTALL IT, AND I HAVE NO COMPUTER THIS IS EVERYTHING TO ME I'VE BEEN WORKING ON A PROJECT FOR AGES AND I NEED IT BACK AND I DON'T KNOW HOW TO RESTORE ANYTHING! I CAN READ YOUR PASSWORDS WHERE I HAVE TO HAVE THEM BUT I NEED HELP IMMEDIATELY. I'M NOT SURE THIS IS THE CORRECT ACCOUNT THAT I USE I THINK I ALWAYS USE D.LYNNTRITCH@GMAIL.COM, AND I'VE ALWAYS USED.. GO AS AN EXTRA PREVENTATIVE ON THERE TO MAKE SURE THAT I DON'T GET SIDESWIPED BY ATTACKERS AND IT HAS WORKED BEAUTIFULLY FOR YOU YEARS NOW I DO NOT USE ANYTHING CONNECTED WITH GOOGLE EXCEPT MY GMAIL ACCOUNT BECAUSE THEY TRACK ME EVERYWHERE AND I WON'T HAVE IT IF YOU CAN'T HELP I'M GOING TO HAVE TO QUIT IT ALL TOGETHER BECAUSE I WILL NEVER USE THESE MACHINES AND HIT ME TRACK LIKE I HAVE BEEN IN THE PAST ANY HELP YOU CAN GIVE ME IS SO IMPORTANT PLEASE HELP ME GET THIS RESTORED SOME WHAT THIS EVENING IF YOU CAN! DEEPEST THANKS! LYNN I USE A MOTO-G G5 ANDROID. IT'S ALL I HAVE AT THE MOMENT...
